## RasterizerState.enableDepthClamp() method

Enable or disable depth clamp if supported

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableDepthClamp(enable: boolean): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  enable | boolean | Enables depth clamp if true, otherwise disable |

**Returns:**

this
